home.title: Hello, my name is
home.text: I'm a creative and an art lover. I'm interested in learning and the challenges that come with the new tasks. This is my portfolio. Thank you for visiting and I hope we can work together.

about.title: About me
about.text: I'm a Digital Arts Engineer focused on the creation of videogames. My career in Web Development began in 2021, I have learned different languages, libraries and software, such a WordPress, React and Angular. In addition, I work a lot with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and TypeScript
